trans-unit.source: Specifies the contextual information about an application thread.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a nível contextual das informações sobre um thread de aplicação.

trans-unit.source: You can use the ApplicationContext class to redefine the circumstances that cause a message loop to exit.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar a classe de ApplicationContext a redefinir as circunstâncias causam um ciclo de mensagem sair.

trans-unit.source: By default, the ApplicationContext listens to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed> event on the application's main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, then exits the thread's message loop.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, o ApplicationContext escuta para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed>eventos da aplicação do principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, em seguida, sai ciclo de mensagens do thread.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext"></xref> class with no context.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext"> </xref> classe com nenhum contexto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.OnMainFormClosed%2A> is not overridden, the message loop of the thread terminates when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.MainForm%2A> is closed.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.OnMainFormClosed%2A>é substituído não, o ciclo de mensagens do thread termina quando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.MainForm%2A>está fechado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.MainForm%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.OnMainFormClosed%2A>

trans-unit.source: The main <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> of the application to use for context.
trans-unit.target: O principal <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> da aplicação a utilizar para o contexto.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Versões de todos os recursos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext>.
trans-unit.target: É possível chamar Dispose quando tiver terminado de utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O método de Dispose deixa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext>num Estado não utilizável.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar Dispose, tem de libertar todas as referências para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext>para que o recoletor de lixo pode reclame a memória que a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext>foi occupying.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [recursos não geridos limpeza](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementar um método eliminar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sempre chamada eliminar antes de libertar a última referência <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está a utilizar não irão ser libertados até que as chamadas de recoletor de lixo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext>do objeto `Finalize` método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext"> </xref> e opcionalmente liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado pelo público `Dispose()` método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected Dispose method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`Invoca o método de Dispose protegido com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro for true, este método versões retidos por quaisquer objetos geridos de todos os recursos que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext>referências.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o `Dispose()` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Terminates the message loop of the thread.
trans-unit.target: Termina o ciclo de mensagens do thread.

trans-unit.source: This method calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThreadCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThreadCore%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThreadCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > ExitThread and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThreadCore%2A> do not actually cause the thread to terminate.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > ExitThread e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThreadCore%2A>fazer chegam causa terminar o thread.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThreadCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: These methods raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.ThreadExit> event to which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> object listens.
trans-unit.target: Estes métodos elevar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.ThreadExit>eventos para o qual o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>escuta de objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.ThreadExit>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> object then terminates the thread.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>objeto, em seguida, termina o thread.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>

trans-unit.source: Terminates the message loop of the thread.
trans-unit.target: Termina o ciclo de mensagens do thread.

trans-unit.source: This method is called from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThread%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThread%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThread%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThread%2A> and ExitThreadCore do not actually cause the thread to terminate.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThread%2A>e ExitThreadCore não causam efetivamente o thread terminar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThread%2A>

trans-unit.source: These methods raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.ThreadExit> event to which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> object listens.
trans-unit.target: Estes métodos elevar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.ThreadExit>eventos para o qual o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>escuta de objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.ThreadExit>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> object then terminates the thread.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>objeto, em seguida, termina o thread.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>

trans-unit.source: Attempts to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before the application context is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Tentar libertar recursos e efetuar outras operações de limpeza antes do contexto de aplicação é recuperado através da recolha de lixo.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and cleans up resources by calling `Dispose(false)`.
trans-unit.target: Este método substitui <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e limpa os recursos ao chamar `Dispose(false)`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Override `Dispose(Boolean)` to customize the cleanup.
trans-unit.target: Substituir `Dispose(Boolean)` para personalizar a limpeza.

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Código da aplicação não deve chamar este método; um objeto `Finalize` método é invocado automaticamente durante a recolha de lixo, a menos que Finalização pelo garbage collector foi desativada por uma chamada para o <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [finalizar métodos e os processos de destruição](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [recursos não geridos limpeza](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), e [a substituir o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> to use as context.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> para utilizar como contexto.

trans-unit.source: This property determines the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> for this context.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade determina principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>neste contexto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: This property can change at any time.
trans-unit.target: Pode alterar esta propriedade em qualquer altura.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.OnMainFormClosed%2A> is not overridden, the message loop of the thread terminates when the `mainForm` parameter closes.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.OnMainFormClosed%2A>é substituído não, o ciclo de mensagens do thread termina quando o `mainForm` parâmetro fecha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.OnMainFormClosed%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> to use as context.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> para utilizar como contexto.

trans-unit.source: Calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThreadCore*>, which raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ThreadExit"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Chamadas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThreadCore*>, que gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ThreadExit"> </xref> eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThreadCore*>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this method calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThreadCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A implementação predefinida deste chamadas de método <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThreadCore%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThreadCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que gerou o evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that contains data about the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um objeto que contém dados sobre o controlo.

trans-unit.source: Any type derived from the <xref:System.Object> class can be assigned to this property.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer tipo derivado de <xref:System.Object>classe pode ser atribuída a esta propriedade.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If the Tag property is set through the Windows Forms designer, only text can be assigned.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade da etiqueta é definida através do estruturador de Windows Forms, texto só pode ser atribuído.

trans-unit.source: A common use for the Tag property is to store data that is closely associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: É uma utilização comum para a propriedade de Tag armazenar dados que estão estreitamente associados com o controlo.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a control that displays information about a customer, you might store a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> that contains the customer's order history in that control's Tag property so the data can be accessed quickly.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se tiver um controlo que apresenta informações sobre um cliente, pode armazenar um <xref:System.Data.DataSet>que contém o histórico de encomendas do cliente na propriedade de Tag do controlo que para os dados possam ser acedidos rapidamente.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains data about the control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que contém dados sobre o controlo.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the message loop of the thread should be terminated, by calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThread*>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o ciclo de mensagens do thread deve ser terminado, chamando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThread*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThread*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
